name: Ranged
description: Skill at aiming missiles.

name: Archery
description: Skill at using the bow and arrow.

name: Crossbow
description: Skill at using crossbows and bolts.

name: Throwing
description: Skill at throwing things.

name: Fighting
description: General skill at fighting.

name: Melee
description: Skill at using melee weapons.

name: Swords
description: Skill at using one-handed swords.

name: Axes
description: Skill at using axes, hatchets, and cleavers.

name: Shields
description: Skill at wielding shields and bucklers.

name: DualWielding
description: Skill at wielding two weapons.

name: HandToHand
description: Skill at using the body to attack foes.

name: Crafting
description: Skill at creating things.

name: Carpentry
description: Skill at constructing buildings and furniture.

name: Herbalism
description: Skill at the collection and identification of herbs and plants.

name: Alchemy
description: Skill at producing alchemical concoctions and potions.

name: Cooking
description: Skill at creating cooked meals.

name: Smithing
description: Skill at shaping metal.

name: Lore
description: Your general knowledge of the world, its people, objects, and places.

name: Appraising
description: Skill at estimating the value of objects.

name: Haggling
description: Skill at selling and buying things.
